source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_SEQ_00<tab>Chambui is in need of meat.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_SEQ_00<tab>再会の市のチャンブイは、人手を探しているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_TODO_00<tab>Slay steppe dzos and obtain their meat.
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the chunks of steppe dzo meat to Chambui's husband.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_TODO_02<tab>チャンブイの夫に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CBF01 /var>を渡す

TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_000そこのアンタ、見たところ、ただの旅人じゃないね。

ちょっと、頼まれてくれるかい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_001<tab>I have been so busy trading today that I have had no time to go hunting. Which is an issue as I am nearly out of buuz ingredients.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_001今日は、いつもより客の入りがよくて、
ボーズの材料が足りなくなりそうなんだ。
娘たちも狩りに行かせてるが、それでも追いつかないほどさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_002<tab>I would like you to slay four steppe dzos for me and bring back their meat. You should be able to find some just outside of Reunion.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_002そこでだね、市の外をウロウロしてる「」を倒して、
「」を4つ取ってきてもらえないかい？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_004<tab>We are far too busy today. I am struggling to keep up.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_004……今日は、やけに忙しいなぁ。
この調子だと、餡がなくなっちゃうよ。
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_010仕事が早いじゃないか。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_011<tab>We Dazkar are somewhat different to the other tribes in that all our hunting is done by our women. My little girls are already proving to be quite skilled with a bow and arrow.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_011うちらダズカル族にとっちゃ、狩りは女の仕事。
女衆のほうが鼻が利いて、狙った獲物を逃さないのさ。
娘たちもまだ小さいが、立派な狩人として走り回ってるよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_012<tab>I am sorry to take even more of your time, but could you deliver the dzo meat to my husband? You will find him just behind that nearby tent.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_012手に入れてくれた「」は、
東の建物の裏にいる、アタシの夫に届けてくれるかい？
店を空けるわけにはいかないからさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_020<tab>Why, hello! Can I help you with something?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_020えっ、旅人さんですよね……？
その……私に何か用でしょうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_021<tab>Ah, you have been hunting for my wife have you? You have my thanks.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_021あっ、妻の手伝いをしてくれていたんですね？
ありがとうございます。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_022<tab>I must say it is quite nice to have the chance to speak with someone that does not belong to my tribe!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_022市に来るときくらいしか、
部族外の人と話さないので、ちょっと緊張してしまって……。
無礼な態度でしたら、すみません。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_023<tab>I would love to talk more, but it is really time I got back to cooking. Speak with my wife and I am sure she will see you are rewarded for your hard work.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_023……では、私は調理に戻りますね。
報酬は妻から受け取ってくれますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_024<tab>I would love to talk more, but I really need to focus on cooking. Speak with my wife and I am sure she will see you are rewarded for your hard work.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_DAZCALHUSBAND02756_000_024……私は調理に戻りますね。
報酬は妻から受け取ってくれますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_020<tab>You may not be aware of this, but those from outside our tribe seldom have the chance to speak with Dazkar men.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_020ああ、肉を届けてくれたんだね。
ダズカルの男と話せるなんて、めったにないことだから、
自慢していいよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_021<tab>Usually we keep our men at home, but my husband's buuz are so much better than anything I could make. I felt I would be depriving my customers if I did not give them the opportunity to sample his cooking.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_021いつもは、男を家の外へ出したりはしないんだが、
夫が作るボーズは、生地はもっちり、具はホクホクの絶品でね。
ぜひとも、たくさんの人に食べてほしくて、ここで売ってるんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_022<tab>Regardless, it is time I got back to work. Thank you for all you have done.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ505_02756_CHAMBUI_000_022さぁて、材料も手に入ったことだし、もうひと稼ぎするかね！
今回は助かったよ、ありがとう。
